Adventurers' Guide:
You look like someone who just went a few rounds with an Ursus!
Thank you for hunting Lost Buffaloes, Frost Buffaloes, Ursus Cubs, Ursuses, Lost Yetis, and Frost Yetis in the Frozen Labyrinth. If you've got 30 cuts each of Buffalo Meat, Ursus Meat, and Yeti Meat, take them to Captain Vishotsky in the Town of Schuttgart.
